text:
@antonioguterres Norway supports @antonioguterres call on #EarthDay. 

As president of @UN Environment Assembly #UNEA, Norway & @Rotevatn are committed to 

🌱 Continue work to halt biodiversity loss 
🌱 Tackle #ClimateChange
🌱 Pave the way for a new normal in the wake of #Covid19
